alert.note: Alert for Kootenai, Cabinet Region (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Missoula (Western Montana and Central Idaho)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 21 at 12:56PM MST until January 22 at 11:00AM MST by NWS Missoula
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 5 PM THIS AFTERNOON TO 11 AM MST MONDAY... * WHAT...Mixed precipitation expected. Total snow accumulations up to two inches mainly above 5000 feet, and ice accumulations up to one tenth of an inch. * WHERE...Highway 93 Eureka to Whitefish, Highway 37 Eureka to Libby, Highway 56 Bull Lake Road, and Highway 2 Kalispell to Libby. * WHEN...From 5 PM this afternoon to 11 AM MST Monday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be affected. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Freezing rain will cause very slick conditions.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
